QuestData.Title: An Ancient Evil
QuestData.Description: $n, I was looking for you!$B$BOne of the escaping sailors just spotted Aysa in the wreckage of the ship, facing some enormous beast. She might need your help - you should go to her, quickly!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the Vordraka, the Deep Sea Nightmare.
QuestData.RewardText: <Aysa is clearly exhausted from the fight.>$B$BYour skills in battle... are unquestionable... $c.$B$B<Aysa catches her breath for a moment.>$B$BDid you save the escaped prisoners? ...Where is Ji? Is he okay?
